<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<record_update table="x_snc_amazon_echo_intent">
    <x_snc_amazon_echo_intent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <active>true</active>
        <always_available>false</always_available>
        <category/>
        <fallback>false</fallback>
        <intent_ends_session>false</intent_ends_session>
        <keyword>WhatsHappeningOutages</keyword>
        <name>What's happening? (Outages)</name>
        <next_intent/>
        <order/>
        <output_speech_format/>
        <reprompt_speech_format/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function(content, attributes, erb){
	var introMessage = "Here is a list of today's outages: ";
	var outroMessage = '';
	var msg = '';
	
	var o = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci_outage');
	o.addEncodedQuery('begin<javascript:gs.daysAgoStart(0)^endISEMPTY^typeINdegradation,outage');
	o.query();
	
	while (o.next()){		
		var updatedArr = o.begin.getDisplayValue().split(" ");
		var updatedDate = updatedArr[0];
		var updatedTime = updatedArr[1].split(":");
		updatedTime = updatedTime[0] + ":" + updatedTime[1];
		
		introMessage += "There is a " + o.type.getDisplayValue() + " affecting the " + o.cmdb_ci.getDisplayValue() + " business service. ";
		introMessage += "This " + o.type.getDisplayValue() + " started on " + updatedDate +  " at " + updatedTime + ". ";		
	}
	
	outroMessage += "To hear the list of outages again, say 'hear outages'. To go back to the status for today, say 'What's happening today'.";
	
	msg = "<speak>" + introMessage + outroMessage + "</speak>";
	
	erb.setOutputSpeech("SSML", "", msg);
	//erb.setReprompt("SSML", "", "<speak>" + outroMessage + "</speak>");
	erb.setEnd(false);
	
	result = erb.getResponse();
	
})(content, attributes, new EchoResponseBuilder());]]></script>
